last_episode_to_air.name: Betty's Graduation
last_episode_to_air.overview: When Kathy refuses to graduate from high school, the family tells her about Betty's reluctance to graduate   from High School, too. This is a recut version of episode 63. It is not part of the syndication package and   is considered ""lost"".

name: Father Knows Best
overview: Father Knows Best is an American radio and television comedy series

episodes.name: Bud Takes Up the Dance
episodes.overview: Bud tries to learn how to dance from a book for his first    school dance.

episodes.name: Lesson in Citizenship
episodes.overview: Jim tells his family to help others and winds up in more    trouble than before.

episodes.name: The Motor Scooter
episodes.overview: Jim buys Bud a motor scooter but Margaret won't let him have it.

episodes.name: Live My Own Life
episodes.overview: Bud moves out, but discovers he can't clean, cook, or take    care of himself.

episodes.name: Grandpa Jim's Rejuvenation
episodes.overview: Jim comes to believe that he is over the hill.

episodes.name: Second Honeymoon
episodes.overview:
Jim's weekend retreat, just he and his wife, looks like a perfect idea to

Jim. First he doesn't want to pass this on to the kids when he learns

that the kids have plans with them; and then when the kids take the

news too easy Jim and Margaret are quite stunned. They leave, but soon

they start thinking about their kids and after reaching the lodge they

want to phone in - but no one answers the call ...

episodes.name: Margaret Goes Dancing
episodes.overview: Jim and Margaret rarely disagree on anything. When a couple asks them to take dancing lessons, Jim goes to his own club only to find it dull.

episodes.name: The Christmas Story
episodes.overview: Jim takes the family into the woods to cut down their own    tree and become stranded there.

episodes.name: Boy's Week
episodes.overview: Jim receives a traffic ticket and Bud is appointed to be    judge on that day.

episodes.name: A Friend of Old George's
episodes.overview: An unwanted visitor that won't leave spoils Kathy's birthday    party.

episodes.name: The Promised Playhouse
episodes.overview: Jim unwillingly says he will sleep in Kathy's playhouse

episodes.name: Jim the Farmer
episodes.overview:
Jim wants to give up his office job in order to move into the country

to lead a quiet and less stressy life as a farmer. His wife doesn't

think that he means it seriously but he has crossed many more lines

to fulfill his dream than he ever did before. Soon the life at home

turns more quiet than he expected and Jim starts to despair at home

because no one from the office calls him, and his replacement and the

secretary despair at the office because they don't want to phone and

disturb him.

episodes.name: Father of the Year
episodes.overview: Jim sells the house and plans to move out into the country.

episodes.name: The Matchmaker
episodes.overview: Margaret tries to get her cousin and her boyfriend married.

episodes.name: Bud the Bridesmaid
episodes.overview: Margaret's cousin gets married in the Anderson house with Bud    as the stand-in bridesmaid.

episodes.name: Proud Father
episodes.overview: Jim tries to help the children regain their confidence.

episodes.name: No Partiality
episodes.overview: Kathy and Betty fight for the attention of the same man.

episodes.name: Lessons in Civics
episodes.overview: A new highway gets built. And for that the old community hall should be pulled down. That's something Jim wouldn't like to see since the hall is a historical monument and also memories from his youth are connected with this hall. Everyone from the family sees how much the hall means to Jim and they use different ways to inform the public or organize help. Kathy, who also wants to help, writes a letter to the mayor - with all the unfledged names Jim has called him in his anger.

episodes.name: First Disillusionment
episodes.overview: Bud loses a job to a boy who fakes his resume, which leads him   to believe it is alright to do this himself

episodes.name: Woman in the House
episodes.overview: Margaret is forced to invite a woman who makes her uncomfortable    because she is Jim's friend's wife.

episodes.name: New Girl at School
episodes.overview: Bud learns that the girl he likes is dating his best friend.

episodes.name: The Big Test
episodes.overview: Bud is accused of cheating because he is suddenly getting high   grades in class.

episodes.name: Stage to Yuma
episodes.overview: Tate Idsen saves a stagecoach from savage Indians in a    flashback sequence.

episodes.name: Bad Influence
episodes.overview: Bud gets in trouble when his latest friend turns out to be    a kleptomaniac.

episodes.name: The Bus to Nowhere
episodes.overview: The last few days Betty has no fun, she's sullen and does nothing. No one gets through to her, not even her parents. Betty faces a personal crisis when she has to find answers, basically, to the meaning-of-life question. The only way out for her is to put Bud's story (which he has written as an assignment) into reality: Enter a bus and go as far as the money takes her.

episodes.name: The Persistent Guest
episodes.overview: Bud new friend won't leave the Anderson house because he has    no family.

episodes.name: Family Reunion
episodes.overview: The family tries to think up excuses to keep from going to    Margaret's family reunion.

episodes.name: The Martins and the Coys
episodes.overview: Betty and her boyfriend refuse to see again after Jim and his   father fight.

episodes.name: Dilemma for Margaret
episodes.overview: Margaret admits before the PTA that she can't control her    children.

episodes.name: The Ten Dollar Question
episodes.overview: The family member who doesn't tattle for one week will receive   ten dollars.

episodes.name: Adopted Daughter
episodes.overview: Kathy finds a receipt for $25 from the adoption center and    believes she was adopted.

episodes.name: Never in Twain
episodes.overview: On a dude ranch, Betty falls in love with a cowboy only to discover the relationship won't last.

episodes.name: Betty's Birthday
episodes.overview: Betty announces that she doesn't want a birthday party or    presents.

episodes.name: Bud, the Millionaire
episodes.overview: To teach Bud a lesson, Jim gives him ten dollars a week for    allowance, but he's not to spend the money on anyone else but    himself.

episodes.name: Whistle Bait
episodes.overview: Betty's esteem is low after another girl gets all the attention   she used to get.

episodes.name: The Family Goes to New York
Margaret Hires a Gardener
episodes.overview: A Spanish immigrant, Frank, fixes the Andersons lawn and then    charges a high price.

episodes.name: Swiss Family Anderson
episodes.overview: The Anderson family becomes shipwrecked on a deserted island.

episodes.name: The Lawn Party
episodes.overview: Bud tells the family they are to set up for a lawn party that    is tomorrow.

episodes.name: Short Wave
episodes.overview: While listening to Buds short wave radio the family overhears    a distress call from a boat.

episodes.name: Betty and the Jet Pilot
episodes.overview: Betty's new boyfriend, a jet pilot, is transferred to Alaska.

episodes.name: Safety First
episodes.overview: When Bud receives a traffic ticket he is forced to become a    crossing guard.

episodes.name: Bud, the Hero
episodes.overview: Bud - a hero? A chain reaction of events, starting with a girl who wants to use Bud to make her boyfriend jealous leads to Bud preventing a bank robbery, making him the hero of the town.

episodes.name: Betty, the Track Star
episodes.overview: 3Apr57   Betty becomes flower queen and wins a track race all in the    same day.

episodes.name: Bud, the Philanthropist
episodes.overview: Kippy takes credit for a church donation Bud made, and Bud    plans to get even.

episodes.name: Baby in the House
episodes.overview: Jim and Margaret takes care of a baby Betty is baby-sitting   so she can go out.

episodes.name: Class Prophecy
episodes.overview: Henry Pruett, a traveling salesman on tour, accidentally knocks on the door of Margaret: she, Jim and Henry attended college together and he was a promising man back then - on his way to become a doctor. But all he is now is the salesman (and a bad one too) and that's embarrassing for him and he decides to keep it a secret. But Margaret and Jim find out about this anyway.

episodes.name: The Art of Romance
episodes.overview: Bud gets advice from Jim on how to win over Judy, while she    is asking Margaret.

episodes.name: Margaret Disowns Her Family
episodes.overview: Margaret tries to help a young woman overcome her fear of    having a baby.

episodes.name: Grandpa Retires
episodes.overview: Jim and Margaret are called in to help Margaret's dad, who's about to hand over his printing office and retire. The main reason is his groggy health lately, but it seems that giving up his office is the actual source for this problems.

episodes.name: Shoot for the Moon
episodes.overview: Sageman helps the Andersons regain their self-confidence.

episodes.name: Follow the Leader
episodes.overview: Bud must decide if he should stand up for a teacher or join    the class in a revolt.

episodes.name: The Awkward Hero
episodes.overview: Betty tutors a football player who will escort her to a dance    as payment.

episodes.name: The Good Neighbor
episodes.overview: Margaret receives a new house which she plans to rent out.

episodes.name: Bud, the Executive
episodes.overview: Bud becomes the chairman for the planning of his high school    picnic.

episodes.name: Sentenced to Happiness
episodes.overview: The Anderson's gardener, Frank, is forced to get a real job    and then winds up in court.

episodes.name: Mother Goes to School
episodes.overview: Margaret enrolls in an English class in college and is put in    Betty's class.

episodes.name: The Indispensable Man
episodes.overview: Bud is not able to play in the football game because he    wouldn't go to bed early.

episodes.name: Kathy's Big Chance
episodes.overview: Kathy competes in an essay contest judged by Greer Garson.

episodes.name: Margaret Learns to Drive
episodes.overview: Jim tries to teach Margaret how to drive a car.

episodes.name: The Way of a Dictator
episodes.overview: Bud is given the pleasure of raising Kathy when he says they    are doing it all wrong.

episodes.name: Mr. Beal Meets His Match
episodes.overview: Betty is going through a phase where she thinks selfishness is the sole motivator in people's lives.

episodes.name: Kathy Makes a Wish
episodes.overview: When Kathy finds a horseshoe and she wishes for a horse, and    gets one.

episodes.name: Man With a Plan
episodes.overview: A girl thinks Bud is going into the Army and throws a going    away party.

episodes.name: Big Sister
episodes.overview: At summer camp Kathy rebels after her counselor, Betty, keeps   pushing her to do better.

episodes.name: Calypso Kid
episodes.overview: Bud practices the bongo drums to impress his new girlfriend.

episodes.name: Father's Biography
episodes.overview: Jim can either attend a business meeting or see Kathy read    his biography.

episodes.name: The Rivals
episodes.overview: Betty has two dates for the same night and doesn't plan to   break either one.

episodes.name: Bud, the Mind Reader
episodes.overview: Bud practices mind reading, and Betty tries to make the    debating team.

episodes.name: Margaret's Other Family
episodes.overview: The family gets mad when Margaret keeps helping a furniture    maker and his wife.

episodes.name: The Trial
episodes.overview: Bud is in trouble when he is accused of causing damage to a    neighbor's property.

episodes.name: Revenge is Sweet
episodes.overview: 26Feb58   Betty teases Bud saying he is sloppy when some very influential   people come over.

episodes.name: Country Cousin
episodes.overview: The Anderson's cousin, Milly, arrives for a visit and to    look at the college.

episodes.name: Poor Old Dad
episodes.overview: Bud believes that his father is henpecked when he willingly    does everything Margaret wants him to.

episodes.name: Betty's Crusade
episodes.overview: Betty tries to help an old man fix up his restaurant so he    isn't evicted by Jim's company.

episodes.name: Young Love
episodes.overview: Bud falls in love with an older woman at the grocery store    who is married.

episodes.name: Tell It to Mom
episodes.overview: Chaos strikes when Betty hides a pair of skates for a friend    of hers.

episodes.name: A Friend in Need
episodes.overview: A very talented dog shows up and takes residence in the    Anderson's house.

episodes.name: A Medal For Margaret
episodes.overview: When Jim plans to build a case for trophies, and Margaret    sets out to win a medal.

episodes.name: The Weaker Sex
episodes.overview: Betty tries to use her feminine wiles on a young man to get    him to take her out.

episodes.name: Jim, the Answer Man
episodes.overview: Jim is bombarded with questions when he is getting ready for    a business trip.

episodes.name: Bud Quits School
episodes.overview: When Bud meets a successful business man who quit school and   Bud plans to do the same.

episodes.name: A Matter of Pride
episodes.overview: Bud is chosen as the most popular boy in his class at school.

episodes.name: Betty Finds a Cause
episodes.overview: Betty tries to make a man remove a hedge that blocks the    view on a road.

episodes.name: Vine Covered Cottage
episodes.overview: Betty and Ralph plan to get married, but find it is not as    happy as they thought.

episodes.name: Be Kind to Bud Week
episodes.overview: Bud thinks Betty has an ulterior motive when she is kind to him.

episodes.name: Kathy's Romance
episodes.overview: Kathy's new boyfriend is more interested in Jim than of Kathy.

episodes.name: Voice From the Past
episodes.overview: Bud prepares for the arrival of the homecoming queen.

episodes.name: Frank's Family Tress
episodes.overview: Frank tries to console Kathy by telling her that his family    are entertainers.

episodes.name: Always Plan Ahead
episodes.overview: Jim tries to teach the children a lesson when they are    constantly not planning ahead.

episodes.name: Second Wedding
episodes.overview: Betty talks Jim and Margaret into getting married again for    their anniversary.

episodes.name: Bud, the Caretaker
episodes.overview: Bud finds a dent on the back of the car he is watching for a    friend.

episodes.name: Betty, the Pioneer Woman
episodes.overview: Betty plays the founder of Springfield's wife in a play of    what really happened.

episodes.name: Fair Exchange
episodes.overview: An Indian exchange student arrives for the weekend from    Betty's college.

episodes.name: Margaret Wins a Car
episodes.overview: In a raffle, Margaret wins a car and uses it to help the    orphans home.

episodes.name: The Great Experiment
episodes.overview: Jim attempts to get the family to broaden their horizons and    disaster strikes.

episodes.name: The Christmas Story
episodes.overview: The family recalls as they are putting up the   Christmas tree, how Jim wanted them to cut their own tree, and in the process got stranded in a cabin.

episodes.name: The Basketball Coach
episodes.overview: Jim becomes the coach of Bud's basketball team.

episodes.name: Kathy, Girl Executive
episodes.overview: Kathy is elected by the family to control Bud's lawn moving    company.

episodes.name: The Good Samaritan
episodes.overview: 5Jan59   Bud must do a good deed for an English report and ends up    resenting the whole world.

episodes.name: The Ideal Father
episodes.overview: Uncle Charlie believes the children are spoiled when they    forget Jim's birthday.

episodes.name: Big Shot Bud
episodes.overview: Bud gets into hot water when he tries to buy Margaret a   bottle of expensive perfume.

episodes.name: Hard Luck Leo
episodes.overview: Leo visits and takes advantage of the whole family until    something surprising happens.

episodes.name: Bud, the Campus Romeo
episodes.overview: When Bus refuses dates, the girl launch an anti-Bud campaign.

episodes.name: Crisis Over a Kiss
episodes.overview: Bud tries to save Betty from her boyfriend but Betty    resents the help.

episodes.name: Kathy Grows Up
episodes.overview: Kathy says she wants to be treated as if she was an adult.

episodes.name: A Man of Merit
episodes.overview: Jim learns that he is to be appointed as an outstanding    person in the community.

episodes.name: Betty Makes a Choice
episodes.overview: Betty is faced with a hard decision that will affect her    future.

episodes.name: It's a Small World
episodes.overview: Margaret must decide to attend a luncheon or go with Jim on    an important trip.

episodes.name: Two Loves Has Bud
episodes.overview: Bud has a hard time when he must decide between two girls to    take to the prom.

episodes.name: An Extraordinary Woman
episodes.overview: The Anderson's are visited by an author on African Culture.

episodes.name: Formula for Happiness
episodes.overview: Strange things begin to happen when Jim's dreams start to come    true.

episodes.name: Bud and the Debutante
episodes.overview: Bud tries to impress a wealthy girl by taking her to an    expensive restaurant.

episodes.name: The Meanest Professor
episodes.overview: Bud regrets writing a bad article about a professor after the    professor finds the article.

episodes.name: Live My Own Life
episodes.overview: This is a recut version of episode 5 with the same name where Bud goes out on his own and tries to make   good.

episodes.name: Bud Has A Problem
episodes.overview: Bud blames his professor when it appears he will not pass    Physics.

episodes.name: The Great Anderson Mystery
episodes.overview: The Andersons act out a detective story when the television    breaks down.

episodes.name: The Gold Turnip
episodes.overview: 1Jun59   Bud feels that there is no use for tradition so he starts to   break all traditions.

episodes.name: A Day in the Country
episodes.overview: While on the way to visit Margaret's parents, the car breaks down leaving the family stranded on a   deserted road.

episodes.name: Bud Branches Out
episodes.overview: Bud falls in love with his college French professor.

episodes.name: The Gardener's Big Day
episodes.overview: Frank is chosen to represent the town at the opening of a park, but when the town council meets Frank,   they want another person to represent their city- someone who looks more like an average American.

episodes.name: The Imposter
episodes.overview: Betty becomes involved with a young lawyer pretending to be the owner of a radio store.

episodes.name: Bud Plays It Safe
episodes.overview: Bud decides to date the coach's daughter in order to make sure he gets on the football team.

episodes.name: Bicycle Trip for Two
episodes.overview: Jim's plans for a quiet bicycle trip end up with Jim and Margaret arguing

episodes.name: First Disillusionment
episodes.overview: Bud tells Kathy about the job he didn't get when another boy faked his credentials.

episodes.name: Margaret's Old Flame
episodes.overview: Jim and Margaret tease one another about people they dated as their college reunion nears.

episodes.name: Kathy Becomes a Girl
episodes.overview: The family tries to change Kathy from a tomboy into a beautiful girl.

episodes.name: Bud, the Willing Worker
episodes.overview: Bud wants a part-time job at a service station in order to get enough money to buy a boat.

episodes.name: Turn the Other Cheek
episodes.overview: Both Jim and Kathy are doublecrossed by their friends.

episodes.name: Good Joke on Mom
episodes.overview: Margaret tricks the family into believing that she has been elected chairwoman of the children's clinic   building program.

episodes.name: Betty's Double
episodes.overview: Betty wins a trip to Hollywood because she looks like a famous movie star.

episodes.name: Father, the Naturalist
episodes.overview: This is a recut version of episode 30. It is not part of the current syndication package and is considered   ""lost"".

episodes.name: Bud Hides Behind a Skirt
episodes.overview: Betty is campaigning for safe driving, while Bud is accused of reckless driving.

episodes.name: Togetherness
episodes.overview: A reporter visits the family in order to do an article on family togetherness.

episodes.name: Second Best
episodes.overview: Betty competes in the college fencing tournament.

episodes.name: Kathy's Big Deception
episodes.overview: Kathy, desperate for a date at the community picnic, makes up a story about a boyfriend.

episodes.name: Cupid Knows Best
episodes.overview: Kathy, desperate for a date at the community picnic, makes up a story about a boyfriend.

episodes.name: The Big Test
episodes.overview: Betty arranges a match between Frank and a worker in a flower shop.

episodes.name: Jim's Big Surprise
episodes.overview: Jim is surprised by his family's lack of interest when he is named Father of the Year.

episodes.name: Time to Retire
episodes.overview: When Bud reaffirms and old man's belief in life, he decides to open his own insurance company and hire   Bud as his assistant.

episodes.name: Bud, the Speculator
episodes.overview: Bud invests money in a phony stock scheme and winds up losing fifty dollars

episodes.name: The $500 Letter
episodes.overview: The Andersons get a check from an admirer and must find out which member of the family the check was   meant for.

episodes.name: Adopted Daughter
episodes.overview: While Kathy is trying to repair her birth certificate frame, she recalls the time she thought she was adopted.

episodes.name: Family Contest
episodes.overview: Kathy destroys a picture of a family competing against hers in a photo contest

episodes.name: Love and Learn
episodes.overview: Bud falls in love with his English Tutor

episodes.name: Blind Date
episodes.overview: Betty dates a boy everyone regards as a loser

episodes.name: Betty's Career Problem
episodes.overview: Betty becomes frustrated when every college contest she enters, she loses to Cliff Bowman, who may even   steal her job, too

episodes.name: Bud Lives It Up
episodes.overview: Bud spends more money than he has in order to impress a girl in Chicago.

episodes.name: Not His Type
episodes.overview: Betty is caught in the middle of an argument between two of her friends who are planning to marry.

episodes.name: Betty's Graduation
episodes.overview: When Kathy refuses to graduate from high school, the family tells her about Betty's reluctance to graduate   from High School, too. This is a recut version of episode 63. It is not part of the syndication package and   is considered ""lost"".
